V0306_01_00_00_0.text:
We are the Plana.
The next evolution of enlightenment.

V0306_01_00_01_0.text:
I won't judge you.
But my cards will.

V0306_01_00_02_0.text: What will you be without your memories?

V0306_01_00_03_0.text: You are nothing against the almighty power of the Plana!

V0306_01_00_04_0.text: If I destroy the vessel, the Pharaoh can never return.

V0306_01_00_05_0.text:
Yugi, you're just a vessel.
You can't win.

V0306_01_00_06_0.text: We banish evil ones to an alternate dimension.

V0306_01_00_06_1.text: And there's no one more evil than you!

V0306_01_00_07_0.text: You will not get the Millennium Puzzle!

V0306_01_00_07_1.text: I'm banishing you to another dimension - never to return!

V0306_01_00_08_0.text: You require everyone to register their duel decks.

V0306_01_00_08_1.text: If I didn't know any better, I'd say you're a control freak.

V0306_01_00_09_0.text: I must admit that your brother is a decent Duelist.

V0306_01_00_10_0.text:
Sera...
It's too late for you to stop me.

V0306_01_00_12_0.text:
Bakura!
You will pay for ruining my life!

V0306_01_00_13_0.text:
It's you!
The dark presence inside the Millennium Ring!

V0306_01_00_14_0.text:
Poor Joey.
You’ll now be banished like all of the rest.

V0306_03_00_01_0.text: You still haven't seen what my Cubic monsters can truly do!

V0306_05_00_00_0.text: I have the magic to remake the very fiber of reality!

V0306_06_01_02_0.text: Do you really think that will work?

V0306_07_09_00_0.text: I flip over my Set card!

V0306_08_00_01_0.text: I send Cubic Karma to the Graveyard to cut your LP in half!

V0306_08_00_02_0.text: I banish Cubic Karma to add a Cubic monster to my hand!

V0306_08_00_03_0.text:
You know nothing of power!
I play Cubic Wave!

V0306_08_00_03_1.text: My Cubic monster's ATK are doubled while yours are halved!

V0306_08_00_04_0.text: I banish Cubic Wave and Cubic monsters from my Graveyard!

V0306_08_00_04_1.text: Now your monsters are no longer of this dimension!

V0306_08_00_06_0.text: By sending a Cubic card to the Graveyard, I can draw a card!

V0306_08_00_07_0.text: I banish Cubic Dharma to get a Cubic monster from my Grave!

V0306_08_00_08_0.text:
I activate my Trap, Cubic Rebirth!
Your attack is worthless!

V0306_08_00_09_0.text: I activate the Trap, Cubic Mandala to revive your monsters!

V0306_08_00_09_1.text: But since they lost their effects, they're not so healthy!

V0306_08_00_10_0.text:
You're in for it now!
Unification of the Cubic Lords!

V0306_08_00_11_0.text: I banish Unification of the Cubic Lords to use its effect!

V0306_08_00_12_0.text:
I activate my Trap!
Cubic Descent!

V0306_08_00_12_1.text: I call forth a new Vijam that you're forced to battle!

V0306_08_00_13_0.text: I banish Cubic Descent from my Graveyard to use its effect!

V0306_08_00_14_0.text: I activate my Trap, Cubic Omen!

V0306_08_00_14_1.text: For each Cubic monster I have, yours leaves this dimension!

V0306_08_00_15_0.text: I banish Cubic Omen from my Graveyard to use its effect!

V0306_09_00_00_0.text: Here's Duza the Meteor Cubic Vessel's effect!

V0306_09_00_01_0.text: Vijam departed to another dimension that you can't attack!

V0306_09_00_01_1.text: And your monster can no longer attack or use its effects!

V0306_09_00_02_0.text: Vijam shifts your monster out of this dimension!

V0306_09_00_03_0.text: Vijam returns from the other dimension!

V0306_09_00_04_0.text: When this Cubic Beast destroys a monster, it can transform!

V0306_09_00_06_0.text: By going to the Graveyard, Buster Gundil can use its effect!

V0306_09_00_07_0.text: With the arrival of this Cubic monster, you take 800 damage!

V0306_09_00_08_0.text: By leaving the field, Geira Guile releases its Vijams!

V0306_09_00_08_1.text: And I add a new Cubic monster to my hand!

V0306_09_00_09_0.text: My Cubic monster deals you damage!

V0306_09_00_10_0.text:
It's not over!
My Cubic monster's effect activates!

V0306_09_00_12_0.text: Even if Indiora is sent to the Grave, it can use its effect!

V0306_09_00_13_0.text: When Crimson Nova destroys a monster, it can deal more pain!

V0306_09_00_14_0.text: Crimson Nova's effect deals damage to all players!

V0306_09_00_15_0.text: I feed my Trinity with your LP to allow it to attack!

V0306_09_00_16_0.text: When Trinity destroys a monster, it can attack again!

V0306_09_00_17_0.text: Let me share the pain I suffered with you!

V0306_11_01_00_0.text: I Summon a monster in Defense Position!

V0306_13_00_00_0.text:
Appear!
Duza the Meteor Cubic Vessel!

V0306_13_00_01_0.text: In this Duel, any mistake will cost you!

V0306_13_00_01_1.text: I summon Vijam the Cubic Seed!

V0306_13_00_02_0.text:
Come forth!
Vijam the Cubic Seed!

V0306_13_00_03_0.text: Say hello to Dark Garnex the Cubic Beast!

V0306_13_00_04_0.text:
Step forth!
Blade Garoodia the Cubic Beast!

V0306_13_00_05_0.text: Emerge, Buster Gundil the Cubic Behemoth!

V0306_13_00_06_0.text: Take to the field, Geira Guile the Cubic King!

V0306_13_00_07_0.text:
Observe!
Vulcan Dragni the Cubic King!

V0306_37_00_00_0.text: Witness a form that is grander than a mere king!

V0306_13_00_08_0.text: Behold Indiora Doom Volt the Cubic Emperor!

V0306_13_00_09_1.text: Crimson Nova the Dark Cubic Lord!

V0306_37_00_01_0.text: I channel all the hatred into the ultimate fiend of despair!

V0306_13_00_11_0.text: Crimson Nova Trinity the Dark Cubic Lord!

V0306_19_00_00_0.text: Duza the Meteor Cubic Vessel attacks!

V0306_19_00_09_0.text:
Indiora Doom Volt!
Send 'em to another dimension!

V0306_19_00_12_0.text:
Now which one shall perish...
Crimson Nova Trinity! Attack!

V0306_21_00_00_0.text:
Heh heh.
I end my turn.

V0306_21_00_01_0.text: You must realize you cannot defeat me.

V0306_28_00_00_1.text: A collective of souls who will rid this world of all evil!

V0306_28_00_01_0.text: This is what happens when you meddle with us.

V0306_28_00_02_0.text:
This is not revenge.
This is doing what is right and just.

V0306_28_00_03_0.text: Your minds are much too feeble to survive my power.

V0306_28_00_04_0.text:
Join us, Yugi.
And remake this world into one without hate.

V0306_28_00_05_0.text: Unlike your tech, my magic has no limits.

V0306_28_00_06_0.text: You've gone to great lengths to create your own collective.

V0306_28_00_06_1.text: But it's all coming to an end.

V0306_28_00_07_0.text: Sera, the Pharaoh can't return if I get rid of his vessel.

V0306_28_00_08_0.text: Do you now remember what you've done, Bakura?

V0306_28_00_09_0.text: You’ll say anything to save yourself, but it will not work!

V0306_28_00_10_0.text: The Millennium Ring is the source of all evil.

V0306_28_00_12_0.text: You'll be going to another dimension more fitting for you.

V0306_28_00_13_0.text: You don't deserve to exist in my world.

V0306_29_00_01_0.text: Can't you understand that what I do is for the greater good?

V0306_29_00_02_0.text: So you had this planned from the start.

V0306_29_00_05_0.text:
I've never forgotten Master Shin's teachings.
However...

V0306_29_00_08_0.text: Must I lose everything because of the Millennium Ring?

V0306_29_00_09_0.text:
How?!
You should be long gone!
You should be nothing!

V0306_33_00_01_0.text: I'll show you a Duel unlike anything you've seen before!

V0306_33_00_02_0.text: Enter the mind of the Plana!

V0306_30_00_00_0.text:
Violence, eh?
That’s so very typical of your kind.

V0306_30_00_01_0.text: You stopped me from communicating with the Plana.

V0306_34_00_01_0.text: You maxed out its ATK? How?

V0306_34_00_02_0.text: So this is what you were going for all along!

V0306_34_00_03_0.text: You caught me in a perpetual loop!

V0306_34_00_04_0.text: Who do you think allows you to continue to exist?

V0306_34_00_05_0.text: Do you believe everything that you see?

V0306_34_00_06_0.text: I've trapped you in a world made up of your own thoughts.

V0306_34_00_07_0.text: Run as fast as you can. But there is no escape.

V0306_34_00_08_0.text: I invite you to our dimension.

V0306_32_00_01_0.text:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links
Ha ha ha...
Come to my world.

V0306_35_00_00_0.text: Do I exist in your thoughts?

V0306_35_00_01_0.text: You will learn that you are nothing without your memories.

V0306_36_00_00_0.text: Bring this Duel to an end.

V0306_36_00_02_0.text: Argh... I leave this Duel to you.

V0306_41_00_01_0.text: Let us go to the realm of dimensions!
